exploreGraph.note: Note: Canvas rendering performance and profiling efficiency will suffer when there are more than 500 nodes in the canvas
exploreGraph.clickSearch: click the |[Search]| button to start exploring the knowledge graph
exploreGraph.canvasNumberTip: Up to 10 analysis canvases can be opened at the same time
exploreGraph.tip: Click on the entities on the right canvas and select the entity you want to extend. Hold 'Shift/Ctrl' key to select multiple entities at the same time.
exploreGraph.layoutTip: There are many entities/relationships in the graph, so it may take a long time to rearrange. Are you sure to continue?
exploreGraph.totalQuery: A total of | paths were found
exploreGraph.operateFail: The operation failed, please go to the canvas to cancel the operation and try again.
exploreGraph.afterSetting: After setting, the first {num} number is displayed in order of search results
exploreGraph.enterVID: Enter VID (One data per row, press [Enter] button  to separate data between rows). The example format is as follows:
exploreGraph.noClassContent: The relationship class cannot be edited if it is assigned to a group
exploreGraph.noClassStatistics: The relationship class cannot be statistics if it is assigned to a group
exploreGraph.sameEntity: All the same entity classes in the canvas
exploreGraph.degree: Explore the shortest path between entities with a depth of 5 degrees
exploreGraph.name: Name
exploreGraph.allExitContent: Part of the current canvas content is not saved. If you exit, explored content cannot be restored. Exercise caution when performing this operation.
exploreGraph.exitContent: Current configuration not saved. The configured content will not be retrived if you abandon the save. Please exercise caution when performing this operation!
exploreGraph.noSearch: No relevant information was found. Please change the search content.
exploreGraph.noSearchRelation: The path relationship between entities not found
exploreGraph.addChange: Select the search result criteria you want to add
exploreGraph.saveSuccess: Saved! You can go to "Domain Knowledge Graph - Graph Analysis" to see
exploreGraph.deleteGraph: Operation failed, the current knowledge graph has been deleted.
exploreGraph.noSearchable: The knowledge graph is not searchable
exploreGraph.notExist: The entity class does not exist
exploreGraph.cannotEnter: You cannot type values other than numbers
exploreGraph.nameExist: The name already exists, please enter it again
exploreGraph.notHaveAuthor: You currently do not have the right to edit this graph visual analysis.
exploreGraph.pleaseChangeContent: If no information is found, please change the search content

snapshots.areYouSureToLoadTheSnapshot: Are you sure to load the snapshot?
snapshots.pleaseExerciseLoading: Loading the snapshot will overwrite what already exists on the current canvas, please exercise caution when performing this operation.
snapshots.areYouSureYouWantToDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?

layout.nodeStrengthNumbers: Positive numbers represent gravitational interactions between nodes and negative numbers represent repulsive interactions between nodes
layout.displayMore: When the number is greater than the set number, click the "Expand" button to display more
layout.fixedSwitching: The fixed entities in the canvas will be cleared after switching the layout. Are you sure to switch the layout?
layout.notCurrentlyExist: Graph visual analysis does not currently exist.
layout.selectStartingEntityTree: Please select the starting entity under tree layout
layout.selectRootNode: Please select the root node of the tree diagram
layout.note: Note the following after switching the layout of any tree:
layout.note1: 1. The system automatically removes the data that is not associated with the entity and the incoming data
layout.note2: 2. The system will automatically release the fixed entity

style.allEntity: Only the same entity classes in the current canvas
style.allRelationship: Only the same relationship classes in the current canvas
style.adaptiveLength: The longest display value under the adaptive length

algorithm.loopDetectionDescribe: Detect loops in the canvas, one loop at a time
algorithm.loopDetectionToastTip: No loop detected on the current canvas
algorithm.louvainMustOnlyOneRelationshipClass: Louvain community discovery is only available if there is one and only one relationship class type in the canvas
algorithm.louvainDefinition: The Louvain algorithm is a community discovery algorithm based on modularity. Modularity is used to distinguish the differences in link density within and between communities, giving the entire community network an aggregated modular structure.
algorithm.pageRankDefinition: Using PageRank will change the entity style
algorithm.weightDefinition: If the attribute is not selected or the current relationship class does not have a value type attribute available, the default weight for each relationship is 1.
algorithm.performingOperations: Performing operations such as diagram calculation/diagram query, delete, hide/unhide will remove the community effect on the canvas
algorithm.tipPageRank: Tip: Using PageRank will change the entity style
algorithm.calculatedUsing: Calculated using the PageRank web ranking algorithm, which calculates the importance of entities based on their relationships

exploreGraph.modifiedYouOverwriteOrCreate: The analysis content has been modified by {user}. You can choose to overwrite or create the analysis content to save
exploreGraph.notCurrentlyExist: Graph visual analysis does not currently exist.
exploreGraph.drawerTitle: You can drag or drop the mouse to adjust the window size, and double click Results title bar to maximize and minimize the window
exploreGraph.sqlPlaces: Please use nGQL to query data
exploreGraph.emptyRuleText: No rules, click | [New group] | button to set a rule
exploreGraph.moreStepTip: Search performance will be affected when it exceeds 3 degrees
exploreGraph.deleteGroup: Are you sure to delete the group?
exploreGraph.ruleSetTip: Relationship between entity class rule and relationship class rule is "and"
exploreGraph.deleteAllGroup: Are you sure to delete all group?
exploreGraph.deleterules: Are you sure to delete the rule?
exploreGraph.defProValueTip: The default value will be used to calculate the path length when the attribute value is abnormal
exploreGraph.deletedRelation: The relationship class does not exist
exploreGraph.relRuleSetTip: Relationship class options may vary depending on range
exploreGraph.ruleSortTip: Attribute conditions within a group are sorted from top to bottom by attribute name
exploreGraph.hideTip: There are hidden entities/relationships in the canvas. Are you sure to remove them together?
exploreGraph.unhideTip: Are you sure to unhide the entities/relationships on the canvas?
exploreGraph.sliceLimitTip: Each slice contains up to 1000 entities
exploreGraph.sliceMaxTip: Up to 100 slices per canvas can be saved
exploreGraph.hasDeleteTip: Some entity/relationship classes has been deleted
exploreGraph.weightAttrTip: The weight attribute is not available when the relationship class does not contain a value-type attribute
